All, a new purchase. An Akasaka ( mumei ) guard in Higo style. I was 
thinking probably mid/late Edo, and one of the Tadatoki school possibly 
?. There is a guard that has similarities in Tosogu no Kansho that is by 
Tadashige ( Mid Edo ) P208.

Any thoughts ?.

Cheers

Rich
